name: Blastoise
flavorText:
A brutal POKéMON
with pressurized
water jets on its shell. They are
used for high
speed tackles.

pokemon.name: Squirtle
pokemon.flavorText:
After birth, its
back swells and
hardens into a shell. Powerfully
sprays foam from
its mouth.

pokemon.name: Wartortle
pokemon.flavorText:
Often hides in
water to stalk
unwary prey. For swimming fast, it
moves its ears to
maintain balance.
